utils.notFound: Enweghị data achọtara na ụdị a.

content.title: Vietpik - Mụta Korean n'efu
content.oneStopPlatform: Mwepu akwukwo nke ndi Koree kachasi
content.learnKorean: Mụọ Korean nwere nkuzi dị elu site n'aka ndị ọkachamara na-efu efu.
content.learnFromExperts: Mụta n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta obodo na ndị nkuzi nwere ahụmahụ.
content.learnAtYourOwnPace: Na-amụ ihe na aka gị na nsị na-akparaghị ókè maka nkuzi.
content.coverAllAspects: Site na mbido gaa ọkwa dị elu, na-ekpuchi ụtọ asụsụ, okwu na mkparịta ụka.

testimonial1.quote: "Vietpik nyeere m aka ịkwadebe maka My Topik nke ọma. Ihe ọmụmụ a na-ahazi nke ọma ma dịkwa mfe ịgbaso!"
testimonial1.name: Nguyen Minh Ah

testimonial3.quote: "Daalụ Vietpik, ịge ntị m na ikwu okwu m na-ekwuala nke ukwuu n'ime naanị ọnwa atọ!"
testimonial3.name: Le thy huoon

content.yourOneStopShop: Nkwụghachi ụgwọ gị na-akwụsị. Ngwongwo adịbeghị adịchaghị n'efu maka nnwere onwe ma mezuo ebumnuche asụsụ gị taa!

metadata.lesson: Chọgharịa ihe mmụta kachasị ọhụrụ ma chọta ihe ị ga-ahụ n'anya.
